# init(time:)

**Initializer**

Creates an instance of an alert.

## Declaration

```swift
init(time: Alarm.Schedule.Relative.Time)
```

## Parameters

- **time**: The time that the alarm starts.

## Creating an alert

- **time**: The time that the alarm emits an alert.
